channel.title: P2P Active Video/Image Sharing and Social Media
channel.description:
If we would like to share our images/videos/thoughts..etc in less surveillance/censorship way then we have to do it in decentralized formula:
Notes:
- There are tens of instances each project has you can search for them yourself. - Sadly Many of these projects using JS and WebRTC which both posses insecurity towards anonymous browsing. - Tor , I2P compatible means having Onion Hidden Services and/or Eepsites based on these projects.
:sunny: P2P Social Media:
- [Diaspora](https://diasporafoundation.org/) (Tor,I2P compatible) - [Pleroma](https://pleroma.social/) (Tor, I2P compatible) - [Mastodon](https://joinmastodon.org/) (No according to my last check) - [GNU Social](https://gnu.io/social/) (No according to my last check) - [Friendica](https://friendi.ca/) (No according to my last check) - [Hubzilla](https://zotlabs.org/page/hubzilla/hubzilla-project) (unkown)
:rosette: Worth Mentioning :dark_sunglasses: : [Elgg](https://elgg.org/) is PHP (trivial JS used) centralized free software Social Media (compatible with Tor,I2P)
:sunny: P2P Image sharing: (Instagram like project)
- [Pixelfed](https://pixelfed.org/)
:sunny: P2P Video Sharing:
- [Peertube](https://joinpeertube.org/) (Not Tor,I2P compatible) - [IPFS](https://ipfs.io/) (Not Tor,I2P compatible but maybe later check [here](https://github.com/ipfs/ipfs/issues/439) , [here](https://www.reddit.com/r/ipfs/comments/apa3d6/i2p_ipfs_gateway_an_ipfs_gateway_that_respects/)) - [WebTorrent](https://webtorrent.io/) (Not Tor,I2P compatible) - [MediaGoblin](https://mediagoblin.org/) (Unkown)
If there are more ACTIVE (<- please focus on this because i dont want projects that doesnt have active instances using them) projects please mention them below so i can add them.
